synthesis_conditions.description: The well-established synthetic procedure yields CC as a white powder containing well-developed square platelets.

recrystallization_conditions.outcome: unsuccessful except with acetone, which produced colorless cuboctahedra identified as ASA
no crystals if allowed to go to completion; deacetylization of ASA almost complete

optical_microscopy_conditions.method: adding CC to water in a Petri dish until crystals floated on the surface
optical_microscopy_conditions.observation: grains disappeared and two new habitats nucleated; thickish joists first and sturdy laths about half a minute later
optical_microscopy_conditions.result: crystals of the furtive form (AC) could be isolated and were stable enough in air for analysis

synthesis_conditions.description: Formed during the degradation of CC in pure water, isolated as a furtive intermediate species.
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: A small decay in intensity occurred, possibly due to moisture adsorption.
